description: A frontend HTML page for visualizing and interacting with database data, including database listing, table selection, and data display with expandable cells.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses the database's table list and loads the tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML table from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content, handling objects, long text, nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
